
::: {.hidden}

\providecommand{\reais}{\mathbb{R}}           % reais
\DeclareMathOperator{\sen}{\text{sen}}        % seno
\providecommand{\vet}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}         % vetor
\providecommand{\ve}[1]{\vet{e}_{#1}}         % vetor e_i
\providecommand{\bl}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}          % blade
\providecommand{\rev}[1]{\widetilde{#1}}      % reverso (til em cima)
\providecommand{\rev2}[1]{#1^{~}}             % reverso (til à direita)
\providecommand{\lc}{\rfloor}                 % contração à esq
\providecommand{\rc}{\lfloor}                 % contração à dir
\providecommand{\grau}{\text{grau}}           % grau
\providecommand{\inv}[1]{#1^{-1}}             % inverso
\providecommand{\dual}[1]{#1^{*}}             % dual
\providecommand{\undual}[1]{#1^{-*}}          % undual
\providecommand{\proj}[2]{\textsf{P}_{#2}[#1]}    % projeção

:::
